data.prayer: Lord, please give the 45 believers in the state of Tsirang the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tsirang, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 22,355 lost in Tsirang that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Tsirang, Bhutan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Tsirang, Bhutan. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, move the 45 believers in the state of Tsirang to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Tsirang who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Tsirang hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

location.name: Tsirang
location.people_groups_list: Chali, Kachari Sonwal, Broq-Pa, Darjee, Gongduk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chali (1,800), Kachari Sonwal (1,100), Broq-Pa (5,600), Darjee (1,900), Gongduk (2,400)
